lead_paragraph: The Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences more than doubled the number of invitations to make good on a promise to increase female and minority membership.

headline.print_headline: Film Academy Adds to Ranks to Lift Diversity
headline.main: Film Academy Broadens Voting Pool After Oscars Criticism

snippet: The Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences more than doubled the number of invitations to make good on a promise to increase female and minority membership.
abstract: Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences announces unusually large class of members for 2016, in which 46 percent are women and 41 percent are minorities, result of academy's pledge to double female and minority membership by 2020; even if all 683 invitees accept, however, percentage of academy members that are women or minorities will still be far short of pledge's goal.
